The great change discoursed of in a funeral sermon, occasioned by the death of Mrs. Martha Thompson, late wife of Captain William Thompson in Wapping. Preached by Nathanael Vincent, M A. minister of the gospel. Vincent, Nathanael, 1639?-1697.
[2], 30 p.
printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside near Mercers-Chappel, London : 1682.
With an advertisment at end of text. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
